AboutMe.title: About me
AboutMe.headline: Who I Am
AboutMe.description: Hey there, I'm Lukas! Write some information about yourself that is IT related. Why are you passionate about coding? What is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills?
AboutMe.location: Where are you based? Would you be open to working remotely or potentially relocating?
AboutMe.cognition: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
AboutMe.quality: A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? You can include some keywords like: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence and collaboration.
